short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Weibo - Easy data extraction tools of Posts, Comments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The weibo.com web page details can be extracted into an editable spreadsheet file with this chrome addon. You can now extract the post list of your rival, brand, products in any product specification, and customer comments for a single post with this plugin.

In contrast to prior Weibo scrapers, our addon takes more than just the post titles and captions.

- We extract practically all page data, including the  Weibo ID, Post URL, Search key, Search key English, Username, Username English, UserID, User Profile Link,  Post Content, Post Content English, Hashtags, Hashtags English, Mentioned, Mentioned English, Date of the article, Number of Likes, Number of Comments, Number of Forwards, Images, From next timestamp.
- It works with all of Weibo's URLs.
- Bulk URL functionality allows you to add up to 100 pages/posts URLs, single post URLs, or both, separated by commas and exported as a single file.
- The scraper grabs post data automatically when you press the Start Extraction button.
- Click the restart button to resume extraction from that product if the extension shuts for any reason throughout the procedure.


How to use:

1. Go to weibo.com.

2. Type any keywords you want in the search window, such as a brand name, post keywords, etc., or pick any Weibo profile.

3. Use the filtering option and then press enter to fine-tune the search results.

4. Launch the chrome extension and click the start button after the search results have appeared. The information will be saved in an excel spreadsheet.

What you get out of this product is:
- Competitor analysis: Export the entire list of posts, as well as the Brand name, Likes, and Shares, to Excel for additional study.
- Get to know your client: Customers' reviews and comments on specific posts are extracted.
- Market research: Learn how customers react to varied post times, brands, and other factors.
- Restart functionality: If the scrapper closes in the middle of a job, you can resume scraping data from the post.
- Bulk URL: A comma-separated list of post URLs from which data can be collected is required for the bulk URL.

You'll be able to retrieve the following information:
- Weibo ID
- Post URL
- Search key,Search key English
- Username,Username English
- UserID,UserLink
- Post Content,Post Content English
- Hashtags,Hashtags English
- Mentioned,Mentioned English,
- Post Date
- No. of Likes,No. of Comments,No. of forwards
- Images

What types of posts are supported:
- All of the categories

How many numbers does the data support: There is no limit.

Supported sites: www.weibo.com

Exception: 
- This suggests retrieving no more than 1000 data points at a time.
- Depending on the volume of data, the extension may hang or require an unusually long loading time.

Technical assistance:
Any suggestions or ideas for improving the items are welcome. Please send an email to hello@datasunday.com.

Developer: www.datasunday.com
